1472180.name: Attack Tactic
1472180.description:
What is Attack Tactic?

Attack Tactic takes inspiration from classic games in the turn-based strategy and dungeon crawling genres to deliver a unique but familiar experience. Featuring top-down grid-based movement and randomly created dungeons, this game aims to mix complex strategy with deep exploration to keep gameplay fresh. Follow a small group of friends to uncover the devastating truth about the reality of this world and do whatever it takes to bring it back from the brink of destruction. Loss is unavoidable, but it doesn't have to be permanent.

What to expect:

  • Explore randomly created dungeons to gather items and materials
  • Play through handcrafted encounters to test your skill and progress the story
  • Craft and customize weapons of all types to fit your play style
  • Recruit friend and foe alike to bolster your team against enemy forces
